channel.title: Item On Interface
channel.description: I was wondering how you would go about adding items to interfaces, for example i was wanting to add something like this. [A pic From Rs] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/xnw76c.png[/img]

item.title: Item On Interface
item.dc:creator: @RedFalconBlue RedFalconBlue
item.description:
@RedFalconBlue wrote:

i found public void itemOnInterface(int frame,int item,int slot,int amount){ outStream.createFrameVarSizeWord(34); outStream.writeWord(frame); outStream.writeByte(slot); outStream.writeWord(item+1); outStream.writeByte(255); outStream.writeDWord(amount); outStream.endFrameVarSizeWord(); }
in another server, not sure if it is what im looking for

EDIT: Ahh found

public void craftMenu(int i) { sendQuest("What would you like to make?", 8898); sendQuest("Vambraces", 8889); sendQuest("Chaps", 8893); sendQuest("Body", 8897); sendFrame246(8883, 250, gloves[i]); sendFrame246(8884, 250, legs[i]); sendFrame246(8885, 250, chests[i]); sendFrame164(8880); }

Read full topic

item.title: Item On Interface
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

You would make an interface and then just put in c.getItems().addItem(####, 1);.

Never mind, I know what he means

[quote=“baddy351, post:2, topic:400696”]Easy, get something to edit the actually interface itself, like add pictures in the cache where the interface is[/quote]Thats a really lazy way of doing it… Even though IDK how ATM. I would try looking for something like the level up interfaces and replacing it so that it shows the item. I know some servers have a skillcape so you could probably do it that way to

Read full topic
